channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This new collection of historic hotels from St. Regis will transport guests to another era of luxury
item.description: St. Regis Hotels & Resorts is recognizing properties with historical significance by launching a new collection in 2027, St. Regis Estates.

item.title: Am I eligible for the Chase Sapphire Reserve's 175,000-point bonus?
item.description: The popular Chase Sapphire Reserve is a premium travel credit card loaded with benefits. Before you apply, let's make sure you're eligible for the bon...

item.title: How to maximize the Hilton Amex Aspire Card
item.description: The top-tier Hilton Honors Aspire from American Express offers some stellar benefits. Here's how to get the most out of it in exchange for the $550 an...

item.title: AAdvantage members can redeem miles for FIFA World Cup 26 tickets starting Dec. 17
item.description: American Airlines is giving AAdvantage members a new way to redeem miles for FIFA World Cup 26 tickets, with early access based on status.

item.title: Turkish Miles&Smiles devalues award prices to Hawaii by 150%, bumps other domestic awards up by 50%
